name: Got Got
description:
The cops are chasing you. Don't Get Got. Smash into the traffic to score extra points. Avoid the police, SWAT, helicopters, and road blocks. Race around the city streets avoiding the cops and completing the mini-missions.

Top Game Features:
--Blocky style graphics
--Single touch game play
--30 Vehicles to unlock
--5 Unique environments
--Pedestrians
--Road Traffic

Blocky cars include : Army Tanks, Ice Cream Truck, Limo, Hummer, Jeep, Ambulance, Firetruck, Garbage Truck, F1 track Race car, turbo bat car, drift specialty car, and many other blocky cars and trucks.


Environments include : Working Airport, Farm, Snow City, Big City, and Island Town.
